channel.title: Documentation on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Overview
item.description: Please explain in few sentences the basic idea of this template and choosen approach (github-pages + github + bootstrap). Give links to most important resources and tutorials.

item.title: Get started
item.description: Please explain how to start. How to install hugo How to set-up gh-pages branch. How to modify content (i.e. add item to the documentation) and publish on gh-pages. Deployment to gh-pages branch While being in master branch # remove previous publication rm -rf public mkdir public # clone gh-pages branch from the local repo into a repo located within "public" git clone .git --branch gh-pages public # generate hugo # commit the changes in the clone and push them back to the local gh-pages branch cd public && git add --all && git commit -m "Publishing to gh-pages" && git push origin gh-pages # publish git push upstream gh-pages
